episodes.title: Inside South Africa’s occult gang culture
episodes.description:
Guest: Dr Ashwill Ramon Phillips | Lecturer and Postgraduate Supervisor, Department of Criminology, University of the Free State
 Occult gangs in South Africa mix spiritual beliefs with violence—using rituals, and muti to gain power and spread fear. Dr Ashwill Ramon Phillips reveals how these groups operate and why new approaches to crime prevention are essential
 Early Breakfast with Africa Melane is 702’s and CapeTalk’s early morning talk show. Experienced broadcaster Africa Melane brings you the early morning news, sports, business, and interviews politicians and analysts to help make sense of the world. He also enjoys chatting to guests in the lifestyle sphere and the Arts. All the interviews are podcasted for you to catch-up and listen.Thank you for listening to this podcast from Early Breakfast with Africa Melane
